scoringPlays.text: Calvin Ridley 12 Yd pass from Jalen Hurts (Andy Pappanastos Kick)
Da'Ron Payne 1 Yd pass from Jalen Hurts (Andy Pappanastos Kick)
Mack Wilson 18 Yd Interception Return (Andy Pappanastos Kick)

videos.headline: Hurts fakes pitch, breaks free for Alabama first down
videos.description: Alabama's Jalen Hurts fakes the pitch to the outside and cuts it up to gain 19 yards.

videos.headline: Clemson's Cain drops potential first down
videos.description: Deon Cain can't secure a pass from Kelly Bryant on 3rd-and-16 and drops what would have been a first down.

videos.headline: Hurts eludes rush, finds Ridley for TD
videos.description: Jalen Hurts scrambles and a throws a 12-yard touchdown pass to Calvin Ridley.

videos.headline: Bryant dances for 20-yard gain
videos.description: Kelly Bryant escapes tacklers and finds a crease for a 20-yard Clemson gain.

videos.headline: Clemson extends drive on Cain's catch
videos.description: Tigers' quarterback Kelly Bryant hangs in the pocket and delivers a strike to Deon Cain over the middle for a gain of 19 yards.

videos.headline: Alabama clangs FG before half
videos.description: Crimson Tide kicker Andy Pappanastos doinks the kick off the upright from 38 yards out as Alabama leads Clemson 10-3 at half.

videos.headline: Saban: Alabama's inability to score 'disappointing'
videos.description: Nick Saban is pleased with Alabama controlling the ball against Clemson, but says it needs to score points when it reaches the red zone.

videos.headline: Swinney: 'We're really fortunate it's 10-3 right now'
videos.description: Clemson head coach Dabo Swinney says his team is playing "about as bad as we can play," but the Tigers only trail the Crimson Tide 10-3 at half.

videos.headline: Dabo sprinkles grass on field pregame
videos.description: Dabo Swinney drops pieces of grass on the field before the game and calls it his "secret mojo."

videos.headline: Clemson starts 2nd half with fumble recovery
videos.description: Crimson Tide quarterback Jalen Hurts fumbles on the hand-off exchange and Kendall Joseph falls on the ball for the Tigers. The turnover leads to a field goal.

videos.headline: Dabo hot after Clemson's missed opportunity
videos.description: Dabo Swinney was not happy with his coaches and QB Kelly Bryant after the Tigers were only able to get a field goal following a fumble recovery.

videos.headline: Alabama pressures Bryant, forces INT
videos.description: The Crimson Tide defense forces a turnover when Kelly Bryant is hit while throwing and Da'Ron Payne catches the non-threatening pass.

videos.headline: Harris goes airborne for first down
videos.description: Damien Harris leaps over defenders on 4th-and-1 for an Alabama first down.

videos.headline: Alabama feeds the big man on the goal line
videos.description: Crimson Tide DL Da'Ron Payne lines up in the backfield and slips open to catch a 1-yard touchdown pass after he put Alabama in scoring position with an interception on the previous drive.

videos.headline: Tide rolling after pick-6
videos.description: Mack Wilson  intercepts Kelly Bryant's pass and takes it 18 yards to the house for an Alabama touchdown.

videos.headline: Hurts collides with Saban on sideline
videos.description: Jalen Hurts rolls right to throw and ends up colliding with Nick Saban on the sideline knocking Saban to the ground.

videos.headline: Clemson can't convert on fourth-and-goal
videos.description: Kelly Bryant throws to the end zone but his pass is too high as Alabama takes over on downs with under 2 minutes left.

videos.headline: Saban: Alabama reestablished its identity
videos.description: Nick Saban says Alabama wanted to find its identity after losing it during the last game of the season and calls the win over Clemson a "great team win."

videos.headline: Payne: 'They should put me at WR'
videos.description: Alabama's Da'Ron Payne creates an interception and a touchdown reception, and says that he and his teammates wanted to prove Alabama was "dominant" again.

videos.headline: Saban's focused on finishing in CFP
videos.description: Nick Saban calls his players "warriors" and expresses how proud he is of the way the Crimson Tide competed.

videos.headline: Hurts wins Most Outstanding Offensive Player
videos.description: Jalen Hurts says he can change his screensaver of Clemson winning the 2017 National Championship title game after winning Monday's rematch.

videos.headline: Bama headed back to another title game
videos.description: Alabama's defense holds Clemson to six points, defensive tackle Da'Ron Payne comes up with a touchdown, and the Crimson Tide are headed toward a showdown with Georgia.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Bama headed back to another title game) 2018/1/1 ESHEET SOTFULL

videos.headline: Payne named Defensive Player of the Game
videos.description: After making an interception and catching a touchdown on the following drive, Alabama's Da'Ron Payne says "I dreamed about it last night and it all came true."

videos.headline: Alabama rolls past Clemson in Sugar Bowl
videos.description: Alabama gets to play for its fifth national title in the past nine seasons as it holds Clemson without a TD for just the second time in 131 games under Dabo Swinney.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Alabama rolls past Clemson in Sugar Bowl) 2018/1/1 ESHEET

videos.headline: Alabama's defense suffocated Clemson
videos.description: Todd Blackledge says Clemson's offense wasn't equipped to handle a healthy Alabama defense.

videos.headline: Blackledge: 'Alabama's defense is back'
videos.description: Todd Blackledge says Alabama's defense played "ticked off" in a dominating performance against Clemson, which held the Tigers' offense to just 188 total yards.

videos.headline: Dabo: Clemson 'competed until the end'
videos.description: Dabo Swinney credits Alabama for making big plays in the second half and says Clemson didn't play its best game.

videos.headline: Saban: Third down success lifts Alabama
videos.description: Nick Saban joins SVP after Alabama's win vs. Clemson and says the key to beating the Tigers was getting off the field on third down.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Interview (Saban: Third down success lifts Alabama) 2018/01/01 SVP

videos.headline: Alabama advances to third straight CFP final
videos.description: Alabama dominates in the rubber match against Clemson as the Crimson Tide's defense stifles the Tigers in a 24-6 win.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Alabama advances to third straight CFP final) 2018/01/01 SCEU ESHEET

videos.headline: Bama returns to the championship game
videos.description: For the third year in a row, Nick Saban is leading Alabama to the National Championship game. Will it end in a win?

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Feature (Bama returns to the championship game) 2018/01/01 ODV

videos.headline: Bama locks down Clemson with smothering defense
videos.description: Alabama holds Clemson to 6 points and under 200 yards as they win the Sugar Bowl and head to CFP National Championship.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Bama locks down Clemson with smothering defense) 2018/01/01 ESHEET ENHL
